013package org.apache.juneau.commons.internal;
014
015import java.util.*;
016import java.util.concurrent.*;
017import java.util.function.*;
018
019/**
020 * System utilities.
021 */
022public class SystemUtils {
023
024   static final List<Supplier<String>> SHUTDOWN_MESSAGES = new CopyOnWriteArrayList<>();
025   static {
026      Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(new Thread() {
027         @Override
028         public void run() {
029            if (! Boolean.getBoolean("SystemUtils.quiet"))
030            SHUTDOWN_MESSAGES.forEach(x -> System.out.println(x.get()));
031         }
032      });
033   }
034
035   /**
036    * Adds a console message to display when the JVM shuts down.
037    *
038    * @param message The message to display.
039    */
040   public static void shutdownMessage(Supplier<String> message) {
041      SHUTDOWN_MESSAGES.add(message);
042   }
043
044}
